LanguageData.AvoidDarkness_ScaledCostMultiplier: Scale {0}. Path costs above 10000 are usually considered unpathable, so be careful when setting this to multipliers above 5k.
LanguageData.AvoidDarkness_IgnoreNonPlayerFaction: Ignore non player factions when calculating darkness avoiding paths
LanguageData.AvoidDarkness_IgnoreAnimals: Ignore animals when calculating darkness avoiding paths
LanguageData.AvoidDarkness_TicksToCacheGlowGrid: Ticks between updates to light area (to reduce expensive calls to glow grid) {0}
